title: New: Ophelia – Not So Frightening
body:
Image: Stephen Hart

With the rise of Lorde and Flume leading the way for Australasia, it’s almost undoubtable that intelligent, electro-pop music is thriving in the area.

**Ophelia**, a duo comprised of producer Patrick Shanahan and singer Alex Louise are vying to add their name to this list of soon to be worldwide stars. Their debut single _Not So Frightening_ is an intense vaguely **Purity Ring** meets **Ellie Goulding** style jam, that’s dark in lyrical content yet upbeat and accesible in sound. Amidst the shouts of ‘hey’, heavy synths lines and a piano riff ripped straight from a horror flick, there lies ones of the most intriguing compositions of recent times. Check out _Not So Frightening_ below, and keep up with Ophelia via [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/listenophelia).
